content.taskInstructions:
Instructions


Run OWASP Amass and review the discovered subdomains.

Variation: Amass


1. Install amass via apt.
sudo apt install amass

2. Run amass against discovered domain names.
amass intel -whois -d netspi.com
amass enum -d netspi.com

Example:


amass enum -d netspi.com

resolve-poc7.netspi.com
resolve-poc5.netspi.com
repository-ext.netspi.com
resolve-poc8.netspi.com
resolve-poc10.netspi.com

Reporting Requirements
